alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:41AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ALLEGHANY COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...CRAIG COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...SOUTHWESTERN GREENBRIER...NORTHEASTERN SUMMERS AND MONROE COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN WEST VIRGINIA THROUGH 815 AM EDT... At 741 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oriskany to near Organ Cave to near Babcock State Park. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ronceverte... Rainelle... Alderson... Union... New Castle... Paint Bank... and Sandstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
